useCase.name: View System Messages

preconditions.precondition: The user has the app opened.

successEndConditions.condition: The user can view system messages and message details.

useCase.trigger: The user opens the system message module in the app.

mainSequence.step: App loads the system message module.
App requests system message data retrieval.
System message module checks for unread messages and retrieves them.
App displays unread message notification to the user.
User taps to view the messages.
System message module fetches the message content.
App displays the content to the user.
